meanings.definition: A person who is obsessed with one idea or subject.
meanings.sent1: The monomaniac talked about his favorite topic all day long.
meanings.sent2: She is known as a monomaniac because she only ever talks about cats.
meanings.sent3: The monomaniac's obsession with collecting rubber ducks is quite amusing.
meanings.sent4: His monomaniac focus on finding the perfect cup of coffee is like a quest for the Holy Grail.
meanings.sent5: The image of the monomaniac surrounded by stacks of books on a single topic is unforgettable.

meanings.sent4: The monomaniac focus of the detective on solving the case led to a breakthrough.
meanings.sent5: The monomaniac pursuit of perfection in her baking resulted in award-winning pastries.
